title: Bunker.The.Underground.Game-PROPHET
description:
In Bunker: The Underground Game, you will take the role of Otto Thompson, a guy who suddenly finds himself in the depths of a secret Soviet bunker. Survive the puzzles and solve the plot twists as you descend deeper and deeper into depths of what just might be the adventure of your life.

Game takes you to an absurd point and click adventure filled with plot twists and mini games, puzzles and humor, pixel art cutscenes and genetically engineered lab animals trying to take over the world.

Minimum:
OS: Windows XP
Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
Memory: 2 GB RAM
Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible 

Recommended:
OS: Vista / 7
Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 1 GB available space
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
